title: Question 29:
description: I'm getting an error that says "SafeERC20: low-level call failed". How do I resolve this?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
This most often occurs when submitting a duplicate transaction. If you want to deposit $100 into a vault, you can submit that deposit as many times you want until one of those transactions is executed. 
Afterwards, the rest will show this error because you no longer have that $100 in your wallet.
